text:
@marcorubio

166 new cases in Manatee County.

Thank God 40% of “hospitalizations” aren’t being treated for #Covid19, right Marco?

Available beds Friday PM:

Manatee Memorial: 2 ICU, 2 non-ICU
Lakewood Ranch: no ICU, 3 non-ICU
Blake: 5 ICU, 9 non-ICU

https://t.co/BfwuZ8EquM
